entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 02:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 8:38 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:38 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:38 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
